field.name: description
field.value:
I think the mail with the patch was overseen in the course of discussion.
I added it here again for application: --- The zip contains an folder called images. The files there must be copied to site\xdocs\images\monorail (If someone knows how to add binaries to patches, please tell me...)
The zip contains two patches: - site.patch contains the documentation xml and a change to the build script (adding the example source code) - trunk.patch adds an example project to the trunk along with changes to the build script for zipping the example.
